com.pixolus.meterreading

Interface BarcodeReadingViewListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    CameraViewListener

    public interface BarcodeReadingViewListener
extends CameraViewListener
    Implement this interface in your Activity to receive barcode results from a hosted MeterReadingView.

    The MeterReadingView reports barcode results and state changes by invoking callbacks on the Activity that is was instantiated from. This interface holds all callbacks that you need to implement in your activity to perform barcode reading.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onScanBarcodes(MeterReadingView meterReadingView, List<BarcodeReadingResult> results, Bitmap image, Metadata metadata)
      This callback is invoked by a MeterReadingView whenever a barcode could be read.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.pixolus.meterreading.CameraViewListener

        onCameraViewCameraError, onCameraViewCameraReady, onCameraViewLayoutChanged

    • Method Detail

      • onScanBarcodes

        void onScanBarcodes(@NonNull
                    MeterReadingView meterReadingView,
                    @NonNull
                    List<BarcodeReadingResult> results,
                    @NonNull
                    Bitmap image,
                    @NonNull
                    Metadata metadata)
        This callback is invoked by a MeterReadingView whenever a barcode could be read.
        Parameters:
        meterReadingView - The View that originated the call.
        results - The list of actual results (i.e. read barcodes).
        image - The bitmap image on which the results were scanned.
        metadata - Additional information about the reading.
